remarks:
A generalization of the Axiom of Extensionality in which ` x ` and ` y ` need not be distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)  Remove dependencies on ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-12 , ~ ax-13 .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2019.) 

---

 A generalization of the Axiom of Extensionality in which ` x ` and ` y ` need not be distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)
statement:
axext3 $p |- ( A. z ( z e. x <-> z e. y ) -> x = y ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
